topic.title: Password Settings
topic.shortdesc: It is highly recommended to change the systemâ€™s password after first login.

ol.li: Go to System System Preferences Password Settings .
Enter a new password and retype the new password to confirm. A strong password is comprised of letters, numbers and characters.
Click Save and Apply Changes, you will be automatically logged out.
Log in to TA1600/2400/3200 using the new password.
